<ng-container *ngIf="summaries">
    <mat-card *ngFor="let summary of summaries" class="default mb-1 pb-0">
        <ng-container *ngIf="!!summary.header">
            <mat-card-title>{{summary.header}}</mat-card-title>
            <mat-divider></mat-divider>
        </ng-container>
        <mat-card-content>
            <adf-card-view [properties]="propertiesForSummary(summary)"></adf-card-view>
        </mat-card-content>
    </mat-card>
</ng-container>
